content.text:
# Draft:1899–1900 Queens Park Rangers F.C. season

The 1899–00 Queens Park Rangers season was the club's 12th season of existence and their first season in the Southern League with the club having turned professional in May of the Previous season .
Season summary
In the 1899–00 season QPR began play in the Southern League Division One and Finished 8th. whilst a ten-game FA Cup run (including defeating first division Wolverhampton Wanderers) ended in defeat at home to fellow Southern League team Millwall Athletic in the Last 16.
